## âœ”ï¸ Code Quality Checklist

### Standards Compliance

- [ ] Code follows [coding standards](../docs/standards/coding-standards.md)
- [ ] Code follows [naming conventions](../docs/standards/naming-conventions.md)

### Angular Best Practices

- [ ] Components use appropriate change detection strategy
- [ ] RxJS subscriptions are properly managed
- [ ] No memory leaks introduced
- [ ] SSR compatibility maintained (if applicable)

### Quality Assurance

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm test`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No new console errors or warnings
- [ ] Code coverage maintained or improved

### Security & Performance

- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Input validation implemented where needed
- [ ] No performance degradation
- [ ] Bundle size impact considered

## ğŸ“‹ Pre-submission Checklist

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

- [ ] I have checked my code for accessibility (if UI changes)
